description:
The Gunpla used by Thai champion Luang Dallara, a veteran of the Gunpla Battle Championship World Tournament. A modified version of the transformable mobile suit Abigor from Mobile Suit V Gundam, it can transform in the same manner as the original machine. It is about twice the size of other Gunpla in the same scale, and very powerful.
Source: Official Website
name: ZM-D11GRB Abigorbine
